dict.string: Search in chrome bookmarks for {query} and open a new tab
Open the selected bookmark in a new tab

##################### #### Version 1.1 #### #####################
## 1.0 ## basics finished: - open the selected tab
## 1.1 ## adding JSON parse for chrome file bookmark
TO DO : - add the possibility to open all bookmarks from a folder
##################### #### DESCRIPTION #### #####################
This workflow allow you to search in google chrome bookmark and open a new tab with the selected item.
When you type the query it gets the suggestion from the file Bookmark with that query and put it into Alfred suggestion.
###################################### #### INSTALLATION / REQUIREMENT ##### ######################################
You will need to install JSON : gem install json
############################### #### USAGE OF THE WORKFLOW #### ###############################
Usage : ob {query}
